SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

net.rim.blackberry.api.mail
Interface Message.Icons

Enclosing class:
Message
public static interface Message.Icons

Defines character representations of the various message status icons.

Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 3.6.0

Field Summary

          Folder icon.

          Message reception error icon.

          Message read icon.

          Message unread icon.

          Composing icon.

          Compressing icon.

          Message delivered icon.

          Encrypting icon.

          Message send error icon.

          Pending icon.

          Message read and acknowledged icon.

          Sending icon.
static int TX_SENT
          Message sent icon.
static int UNREAD_FOLDER
          Folder with unread messages icon.
